ai-tha-ap385:0.3_0: he gave the gift of the Elder Nun Bhaddā Kāpilānī
ai-tha-ap385:1.4_0: meditate on the ugly aspects of the body:
ai-tha-ap385:2.1_0: When a person has confidence in him
ai-tha-ap385:2.2_0: Like the timid in the forest,
ai-tha-ap385:3.2_0: I used to be a fruit.
ai-tha-ap385:3.3_0: I’m not aware of any living creatures.
ai-tha-ap385:5.1_0: It was so welcome for me
ai-tha-ap385:7.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Udumbara.
ai-tha-ap385:8.1_0: for the third time Udumbarikā made of the Elder Udumbara,
